name: Don't Die My Darling
description:
Dating Sim + Top Scroller.

Wandering the land obscure and lonely, you’ve met a mysterious woman. She asks you to help unfortunate spirits to find their way to peace. 
And in return she might tell you something. Or even show.
If you're lucky.
Controls: 
Control ghosts using tapping LMB.
Talk to the woman using your head.
